players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Charlie: "I trust Bob's investigation. Let's vote Alice out to protect the town."
Charlie: "I trust Bob's detective work. Alice's silence speaks volumes. Let's vote her out."
You: "Bob and Charlie, I'm the mafioso. I don't know why you believe me to be one when Diana's death was already a fact."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and confirmed she is mafioso. Her confession confirms my findings. We must vote her out."
